mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADDR, USER_PHONE, USER_ROLE, USER_ENABLE, USER_REGDATE, USER_UPD_DATE) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email},#{user_addr}, #{user_phone},#{user_role},#{user_enable} ,#{user_regdate}, #{user_upd_date})
